Class KafkaUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka.KafkaUtil

  • public class KafkaUtil
extends Object
    Provides some utilities related to Kafka communication.
    Author:
    cwinkler

      static class  KafkaUtil.ClientType
      Kafka client connection type.

      static Properties filterKafkaProperties(Properties properties, KafkaUtil.ClientType clientType)
      Filters properties starting with NjamsSettings.PROPERTY_KAFKA_CLIENT_PREFIX and cuts the prefix for using them as configuration for the Kafka client.

      Filters properties starting with NjamsSettings.PROPERTY_KAFKA_CLIENT_PREFIX and cuts the prefix for using them as configuration for the Kafka client.

    • Method Detail

      • testTopics

        public static Collection<String> testTopics(Properties njamsProperties,
                                            String... topics)
        Uses the given Kafka properties for connecting and checking the given topics for existence.
        Parameters:
        njamsProperties - nJAMS client properties
        topics - Topics to test.
        Returns:
        The set of topics that have been found, i.e., topics that are not returned have not been found.

      • filterKafkaProperties

        public static Properties filterKafkaProperties(Properties properties,
                                               KafkaUtil.ClientType clientType)
        Filters properties starting with NjamsSettings.PROPERTY_KAFKA_CLIENT_PREFIX and cuts the prefix for using them as configuration for the Kafka client.
        Parameters:
        properties - The original client properties.
        clientType - Indicates the Kafka client type for that the resulting properties shall be applicable.
        Returns:
        Properties instance prepared to be used as Kafka client configuration.

      • filterKafkaProperties

        public static Properties filterKafkaProperties(Properties properties,
                                               KafkaUtil.ClientType clientType,
                                               String clientId)
        Filters properties starting with NjamsSettings.PROPERTY_KAFKA_CLIENT_PREFIX and cuts the prefix for using them as configuration for the Kafka client.
        Parameters:
        properties - The original client properties.
        clientType - Indicates the Kafka client type for that the resulting properties shall be applicable.
        clientId - If the resulting properties do not contain client.id or group.id, this values is used for the according setting.
        Returns:
        Properties instance prepared to be used as Kafka client configuration.
